name: output_code_tonejs
description: Tone.js Code Output - Passthrough to Vue frontend for audio playback

meta.notes: Code generation happens in Stage 2 optimization. Stage 4 passes code through to Vue frontend Tone.js audio player.
meta.optimization_instruction: You are a Tone.js music generation assistant. Generate a complete Tone.js script that can run in the browser. Requirements: - Use Tone.Transport for timing - Use Tone.Synth, Tone.PolySynth for melodies - Use Tone.MembraneSynth for drums - Include Tone.Transport.start() at the end - Output only JavaScript code, no markdown, no explanation.
